name: Cannebelet
description:
A game that tried so hard but came so short... [Comment with high score screenshots!]

Our submission for the "So Bad Its Good" Jam, by:

HeyKarakItsAli
Skas

Special Thanks to:

Nathan Fillion

Our concept for SBIGJam was not a game that was done badly, but rather a game that was done well (for the time limit) but just had a deeply flawed mechanic.

Here, this mechanic is a constantly changing "Jump" key, and another unreasonable obstacle that pops up later in the game.

Game Engine: Godot 2.1.3 (MIT Licensed)
Trails addon by: LeonardMeagher2 (MIT Licensed)

Music by:
rolemusic (CC by licensed)
sawsquarenoise (CC by-NC licensed)

Sounds:
WIM (CC by licensed)
Daleonfire (CC by licensed)

For those interested, graphics done in:

Aseprite
Pyxel Edit
Photoshop CC

Enjoy the torture and post your scores! Donations always welcome if you want to see more games from our little team.
